name: com.presh.rebindableinputui
description: This is a plug-n-play UI implementation for rebindable Keyboard/Mouse and Controller/Gamepad controls using Unity's InputSystem. The implementation most closely resembles Rocket League's controls/bindings UI (check out the sample).

samples.description: A sample that implements a base UI to redbind a sample input mapping. A sample Input Manager is also provided to demonstrate how to setup your game's input alongside this package.
